(Simplified: 驸)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 付 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
    • 付 [ fù ] give, deliver, pay, hand over; entrust
①(駙馬)原爲官名“駙馬都尉”的簡稱；中國魏晉以後帝王女婿常任此職，後就成爲帝王女婿的專稱。
②幾匹馬共同拉車，在旁邊的馬。
駙馬 [ fù mǎ ]: emperor's son-in-law
(Simplified: 驸)

Pictophonetic: 付 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning extra horse or imperial son-in-law.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 駙马 fù mǎ (son-in-law)

駙字的基本解释

駙
fù
见“驸”。

駙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》符遇切，去遇，奉。］
“驸1”的繁体字。
(1)驾副车的马。
(2)通“輔”。夹车木。

駙字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駙； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1436第17
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?符遇切，音附。【說文】副馬也。一曰近也。一曰疾也。　又駙馬都尉，官名。漢武帝置，掌駙馬，魏晉尚公主，?稱駙馬。【趙葵行營雜錄】皇女爲公主，其夫必拜駙馬都尉，故謂之駙馬。宗室女封郡主者，謂其夫爲郡馬，縣主者爲縣馬，不知何義。　【六書故】作?。俗作䮛，非。

Traditional characters for "驸1".

Prince Consort
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　驸; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1436 Page 17
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Fu Yuqie, with sound attached. [Said the text] Deputy Ma also. One said it was near. One said sickness.　You Du Ma, the official name. Set by Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty, he was a princess in the Wei and Jin Dynasty, and he was called a princess. [Zhao Kuixingying Miscellaneous Records] The emperor is a princess, and her husband must worship Du Li, so it's called the consort. The clan female appoints the princess owner, saying that her husband is a county horse, and the county owner is a county horse. I don’t know what it means.　【Six Books】For?. Vulgar is not.
